items.name: Rapture Salvation
implicitMods: 12% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
While a Unique Enemy is in your Presence, 16% increased Temporal Chains Curse Effect
explicitMods: 10% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff giving more poison damage and a chance to inflict poison. When you poison an enemy while you have this buff, you gain Virulence, and summon an Agony Crawler minion that uses projectile and area attacks. You will lose Virulence over time, at a rate which increases the more Virulence you have. The minion will die when you have no Virulence.
explicitMods: Buff grants 40% chance to Poison on Hit
Grants Virulence when you Poison an Enemy
Buff grants 10% more Damage with Poison
Agony Crawler has 4% increased Attack Speed per Virulence you have
Agony Crawler deals 9% increased Physical Damage per Virulence you have
Agony Crawler has 40 to 75 Added Physical Damage per Virulence you have
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal arcing lightning damage to attackers when you block them.

properties.name: Trap, Mine, Spell, Minion, Cold, Lightning, AoE, Aura

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Chilling Skitterbot and a Shocking Skitterbot, which will trigger your traps and detonate your mines. Mines detonated by Skitterbots will re-arm and can then be detonated again. The Skitterbots grant you more trap and mine damage, and cannot be targeted or damaged.
explicitMods: Maximum 1 Summoned Skitterbot of each type
Chilling Skitterbot's Aura Chills Enemies near it
Shocking Skitterbot's Aura Shocks Enemies near it
Minions have 10% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments on Enemies
Skitterbots grant 10% more Trap and Mine Damage

hybrid.secDescrText: Calls lightning down to infuse your weapon, then performs a melee attack and causes lightning to strike nearby enemies, dealing damage in an area around each. Hitting an enemy grants an aura, giving you and your allies additional lightning damage for a duration, and additional lightning bolts with Smite. Requires a Sword, Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.
